question: In which country do you work?
lang_trans1: In welchem Land arbeitest Du?

question: What is the highest qualification you have obtained?
lang_trans1: Was ist Dein höchster Bildungsgrad?

question: In which subject is your highest academic qualification?
lang_trans1: In welchem Fach hast Du diesen Bildungsgrad erlangt?

question: Enter your academic subject
conditional: if other at the previous one
lang_trans1: In welchem Fachgebiet arbeitest Du?

question: Do you hold any other professional qualifications?
lang_trans1: Besitzt Du andere Ausbildungen?

question: Do you write code as part of your job?
lang_trans1: Schreibst Du Quellcode auf Arbeit?

question: Who uses the code that you write?
lang_trans1: Wer nutzt den von Dir geschrieben Code?

question: Do you consider yourself a professional software developer?
lang_trans1: Bezeichnest Du dich als professioneller Softwareentwickler?

question: How many years of Software development experience do you have?
lang_trans1: Wieviele Jahre Erfahrung hast Du als Softwareentwickler?

question: In an average month, how much time do you spend on software development (Please rate your answer between 1 to 10. 1 Being none at all and 10 being All your time.)
lang_trans1: Wieviel Zeit verbringst Du im Durschnitt monatlich mit Softwareentwicklung? (Bitte wähle zwischen 1 und 10, 1 = gar nicht, 10 = nahezu komplett)

question: In an average month, how much time do you spend on Research
lang_trans1: Wieviel Zeit verbringst Du im Durschnitt monatlich mit Forschung?

question: In an average month, how much time do you spend on Management
lang_trans1: Wieviel Zeit verbringst Du im Durschnitt monatlich mit Management?

question: In an average month, how much time do you spend on Teaching
lang_trans1: Wieviel Zeit verbringst Du im Durschnitt monatlich mit Lehre?

question: In an average month, how much time do you spend on Other activities
lang_trans1: Wieviel Zeit verbringst Du im Durschnitt monatlich mit anderen Aktivitäten?

question: What type of organisation do you work for?
lang_trans1: In welchem Typ Wissenschaftsbetrieb arbeitest Du?

question: Which University?
source: Lost source but modified to include different London Univ
lang_trans1: In welcher Universität?

question: Please enter the university
lang_trans1: Bitte benenne die Universität!

question: Which organisation do you work for?
lang_trans1: Für welche Organisation arbeitest Du?

question: What is your official job title?
lang_trans1: Wie ist Deine offizielle Stellenbezeichnung?

question: Are you known in your group by a different job title? If so, please enter the job title you use
lang_trans1: Bist Du innerhalb Deiner Gruppe unter einer anderer Stellenbezeichung bekannt? Wenn ja, welche?

question: Do you work full time or part time
lang_trans1: Bist Du Vollzeit oder Teilzeit beschäftigt?

question: What type of contract are you employed on?
lang_trans1: Welcher Natur ist Dein Arbeitsvertrag?

question: When did you start your current contract
lang_trans1: Nenne das Startdatum Deines jetzigen Arbeitsvertrages!

question: What is the duration of your current contract?
lang_trans1: Welche Dauer hat Dein jetziger Arbeitsvertrag?

question: In which disciplines do you work (select as many as apply)
source: Same source as for academic field
lang_trans1: In welchen Feldern arbeitest Du?

question: Where was your previous job based?
lang_trans1: In welchem Bereich war Dein vorheriger Job?

question: Rank the following factors dependent on how strongly they influenced your decision to accept your current position
source: RSE interviews, review main features that people liked in their job

question: Do you always work with the same researcher(s), or do you regularly change the researcher(s) you work with?
lang_trans1: Arbeitest Du regelmässig mit den selben Forschern oder arbeitest Du oft mit verschiedenen Forschern?

question: Do you work for a Research Software Group?
lang_trans1: Arbeitest Du für eine Forschungsgruppe, die Software entwickelt?

question: Has your software contributed to research that has been published in a journal or at a conference?
lang_trans1: Hat Deine Software zu einer Arbeit beigetragen die in einem Journal oder auf einer Konferenz vorgestellt wurde?

question: In general, when your software contributes to a paper, are you acknowledged in that paper?
lang_trans1: Wirst Du für gewöhnlich anerkannt, wenn deine Software zu einer Publikation beigetragen hat?

question: Are you generally named as the main author of the paper?
lang_trans1: Wirst Du gewöhnlich als Hauptautor einer Publikation genannt?

question: Are you generally named as a co-author of the paper?
lang_trans1: Wirst Du gewöhnlich als Co-Autor einer Publikation genannt?

question: Are you generally acknowledged in the main text of the paper?
lang_trans1: Wirst Du gewöhnlichin den 'acknowledgements' einer Publikation genannt?

question: Have you ever presented your software work at a conference or workshop?
lang_trans1: Hast Du Deine software-bezogene Arbeit schon mal auf einer Konferenz oder Workshop vorgestellt?

question: Which conference(s)/workshop(s)
lang_trans1: Auf welcher Konferenz, auf welchem Workshop?

question: How many software projects are you currently involved in?
lang_trans1: In wievielen Softwareprojekten bis Du direkt involoviert?

question: What is the bus factor of your most important software project?
lang_trans1: Wie ist der Bus-Faktor Deiner wichtigsten Softwareprojekte? (Bus-Faktor; Anzahl der Entwickler die von einem Bus überfahren werden müssen, damit ein Projekt stillsteht)

question: Is there a technical hand-over plan for your most important software project?
lang_trans1: Gibt es einen technischen Übergabeplan für Dein wichtigstes Softwareprojekt?

question: In general, what sort of testing do you conduct on your software? (check all that apply)
lang_trans1: Welche Sorte Tests wendest Du im Allgemeinen auf Deine Software an? (wähle alle treffenden)

question: Have you ever released your software under an open-source licence?
lang_trans1: Hast Du jemals Software unter einer Open-Source-Lizenz veröffentlicht?

question: How often do you release the software projects you've worked on under an open-source licence?
lang_trans1: Wie oft veröffentlichst Du von Dir realisierte Softwareprojekte unter einer Open-Source-Lizenz?

question: Have you ever used a Digital Object Identifier (DOI) to identify your software?
lang_trans1: Hast Du jemals einen DOI (Digital Object Identifier) Deiner Software zur Identifizierung zugewiesen?

question: How often do you associate your software with a Digital Object Identifier (DOI)?
lang_trans1: Wie oft weist Du Deiner Software DOIs (Digital Object Identifier) zu?

question: Have you ever trained researchers in computational techniques?
lang_trans1: Hast Du schon einmal Forschende in rechnergestützt Methoden aus-/weitergebildet?"

question: On average, how many times a year do you take part in providing training?
lang_trans1: Wie oft im Jahr nimmst Du in Weiterbildungen als Lehrender Teil?

question: What training programs are you involved with (comma separated list)  (For example, Software Carpentry, local university training, etc.)
Do you know the source of the funding used to support you and your current, largest project?
Which of the following sources are used to pay for your effort as an RSE/equivalent?
Which of the following sources are used to fund your current, largest project?
Which of the following sources were used to fund your current, largest project three years ago?
Do you receive sufficient information on the results of your work?
Does your work give you the opportunity to check on how well you are doing your work?
In your work, do you have access to sufficient data and information?
Do you receive sufficient information on the purpose of your work?
Does your work provide you with direct feedback on how well you are doing your work?
Does your supervisor/line manager inform you about how well you are doing your work?
Do your colleagues inform you about how well you are doing your work?
lang_trans1: Informieren Dich Deine Kollegen darüber, wie gut Du Deine Arbeit machst?

question: How often do you feel frustrated when not given the opportunity to achieve your personal work-related goals?
How often do you look forward to another day at work?
lang_trans1: Wie oft sehnst Du Dich nach dem nächsten Tag auf Arbeit?

question: How often do you consider leaving your job?
lang_trans1: Wie oft denkst Du daran Deinen Job an den Nagel zu hängen?

question: How often do dream about getting another job that will better suit your needs?
lang_trans1: Wie oft träumst Du davon einen anderen Job anzutreten, der Dir besser passt?

question: My current job satisfies my personal needs
I would accept another job at the same compensation level if I was offered it
I am satisfied with my supervisor/line manager's confidence in me
I am satisfied with a word of thanks from my supervisor/line manager
I am satisfied with the recognition I receive from my supervisor/line manager for doing my job
I am satisfied with the compliments from my supervisor/line manager concerning my work
I am satisfied with the encouragement from my supervisor/line manager while doing my job
It would not be very difficult for me to get an equivalent job in a different organisation
I can think of a number of organisations that would probably offer me a job
My experience is in demand on the labour market
Given my qualifications and experience, getting a new job would not be very hard at all
I find real enjoyment in my job
Most days I am enthusiastic about my job
I feel fairly well satisfied with my job
I like my job better than the average person
In general, how satisfied are you with Your current position
In general, how satisfied are you with Your career
Please select your gender
lang_trans1: Bitte wähle Dein Geschlecht!

question: Please select your age
lang_trans1: Bitte gib Dein Alter an!

question: How would you describe your ethnic origin?  This refers to people who share the same cultural background and identity, not country of birth or nationality.
Do you have a condition that is defined as a disability by the Equality Act 2010*
Please select the range of your salary
What Operating System do you prefer to use at work?
lang_trans1: Welches Betriebsystem bevorzugst Du auf Arbeit?

question: What programming languages do you use at work? (Select as many as apply)
Are you a member of the UK RSE Association? (Members are people who have signed up to the UK RSE mailing list)
How do you meet other RSEs?
lang_trans1: Wie triffst du andere akademische Softwareentwickler?

question: What three skills would you like to acquire or improve to help your work as a Research Software Engineer? The skills can be technical and non-technical.
How did you learn the skills you need to become an RSE?
